description: This file defines a FastAPI router for handling log retrieval endpoints related to execution runs. It includes a route to get logs for a specific run, using dependency injection for database session and current user, and returns a URL for downloading or previewing logs.

classes.name: LogResponse
classes.description: Pydantic model used to structure the response containing the log URL.

methods.name: get_logs( run_id: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: dict = Depends(get_current_user) )
methods.description: API endpoint to retrieve logs for a specific run ID, returning a presigned URL or raising a 404 error if not found.

ctags.name: get_logs
ctags.signature: ( run_id: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: dict = Depends(get_current_user) )
